text: The James Madison Dukes women's lacrosse team is an NCAA Division I college lacrosse team representing James Madison University as part of the Colonial Athletic Association. They play their home games at Sentara Park in Harrisonburg, Virginia. ==Individual career records== Reference: {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Amount ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:70px; "|Years |- style="text-align:center;" | Goals || 201 || Gail Decker || 2001-04 |- style="text-align:center;" | Assists || 121 || Monica Zabel || 2009-12 |- style="text-align:center;" | Points || 267 || Gail Decker || 2001-04 |- style="text-align:center;" | Ground balls || 187 || Lisa Staedt || 2000-03 |- style="text-align:center;" | Draw controls || 245 || Haley Warden || 2015-18 |- style="text-align:center;" | Caused turnovers || 119 || Haley Warden || 2015-18 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 648 || Joy Jones || 1985-88 |- style="text-align:center;" | Save % || .607 || Chris Bauer || 1982-84 |- style="text-align:center;" | GAA || 7.31 || Meg Cortezi || 1993-96 |} ==Individual single-season records== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Amount ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:50px; "|Year |- style="text- align:center;" | Goals || 81 || Gail Decker || 2004 |- style="text- align:center;" | Assists || 49 || Monica Zabel || 2012 |- style="text- align:center;" | Points || 112 || Gail Decker || 2004 |- style="text- align:center;" | Ground balls || 76 || Lisa Staedt || 2003 |- style="text- align:center;" | Draw controls || 108 || Haley Warden || 2015-18 |- style="text-align:center;" | Caused turnovers || 47 || Haley Warden || 2017 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 203 || Jennifer Corradini || 2001 |- style="text-align:center;" | Save % || .646 || Joy Jones || 1987 |- style="text-align:center;" | GAA || 5.31 || Joy Jones || 1988 |} ==Seasons== Reference: ==Postseason Results== The Dukes have appeared in 15 NCAA tournaments.
